description:
Low profile cushioning for hot days where wearing 2 pairs of shorts, it 1 pair too many. Slip this Padded Underwear under your favourite riding shorts for targeted protection that will keep you comfy, without that “can’t wait to change” feeling. The minimalist design also works great under riding pants on your cooler rides.

  • Stretchy poly blend wicks away moisture and dries quickly
  • 3H chamois uses varying thicknesses and varying foam densities to maximize comfort
  • Great for hot weather, park days, or anytime you want protection without feeling like you are wearing a chamois
  • Regular fit offers a trim, aerodynamic fit, without being too snug
name: Peppermint Padded Underwear - Women's
